title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Designing e-Learning Competency-Based Performance Assessments: The 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design realistic tasks using the core elements of the 4C/ID model (learning environment, supportive information, procedural information, part-task practice).
Learners can develop and apply competency-based performance assessment tools in e-learning environments.
Learners can design an iterative performance assessment process that incorporates feedback from both learners and evaluators.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
